## BasicPagingOptions interface

Basic paging options

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BasicPagingOptions extends PagingOptions<CssClassesBasicPaging> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [itemsPerPageValues](./grid.basicpagingoptions.itemsperpagevalues.md) | <code>number[]</code> | Gets or sets array of available values for itemsPerPage, NaN represents infinity (all data) |
|  [pagesDispersion](./grid.basicpagingoptions.pagesdispersion.md) | <code>number</code> | Page dispersion parameter for rendered pages |
